projects.title: Reddit Web Scraper
projects.description: This application a very simple setup process, needing just a Reddit API registered account. Just install the application, add your account details, and get scraping!

projects.title: Tic Tac Toe
projects.description: The starter includes predefined sections as well as a template for new, custom sections. Moreover, you can add new projects to this section without additional coding. Photo by Kelly Sikkema on Unsplash.
